text: Which limb do I take first?
title: The Scorpion King

text: May the gods have pity on you.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You're lucky we have the same mother.
title: The Scorpion King

text: NARRATOR: Before the time of the pyramids,a fearsome horde came from the east...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...and swept across the barren landsof the ancient world.
title: The Scorpion King

text: By the law of the horde, their greatestwarrior was proclaimed their king.
title: The Scorpion King

text: He was the greatest swordsmanthe world had ever seen.
title: The Scorpion King

text: With the predictions of a sorcerer, whocould foretell the outcome of every battle...
title: The Scorpion King

text: [Crowd shouting and screaming]...until only a brave few remained.
title: The Scorpion King

text: My father has called for silence!
title: The Scorpion King

text: KING PHERON: We are gathered in thisplace to put our differences aside.
title: The Scorpion King

text: There is still time for us...
title: The Scorpion King

text: With his sorcerer at his side...
title: The Scorpion King

text: And, if the sorcerer were to die...
title: The Scorpion King

text: BALTHAZAR:It's too late for your schemes, Pheron.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I have raided Memnon's caravans,broken the supply lines to his troops...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...but he still swept acrossthe land like a plague.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I will not send my people to theirdeaths in a battle that can't be won.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And what people would that be, Balthazar?
title: The Scorpion King

text: You are the ruler of nothing...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...why are you on your knees before me?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Akkadians.I thought they were wiped out long ago.
title: The Scorpion King

text: KING PHERON:They are the last of their kind.
title: The Scorpion King

text: By their hand, the sorcerer will die.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You put your faith in a clan ofcutthroats who kill for money?
title: The Scorpion King

text: They're more than that. They're skilled assassinstrained for generations in the deadly arts.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And what price do these mercenariesask from us, Father?
title: The Scorpion King

text: But that's the last of our treasury.
title: The Scorpion King

text: If these men kill the sorcerer,will you fight?
title: The Scorpion King

text: As long as one of us still breathes...
title: The Scorpion King

text: JESUP: We can reachMemnon's encampment by nightfall.
title: The Scorpion King

text: When are you going to get ridof that filthy beast?
title: The Scorpion King

text: He doesn't mean anything by it.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I am a high priest of Seth.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Spare me, and I shall bless theein five different languages.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You will scream in fivedifferent languages, horse thief!
title: The Scorpion King

text: - Hey!- I am not that heavy.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Look out for the fat one!He's behind you!
title: The Scorpion King

text: Help me, whoever you are, help me!
title: The Scorpion King

text: Thank you. Thank you, good sir.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Surely you have heard of theenormous reward for my safe return.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I hear you train yourselves to bear great pain.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You must teach me this,if you live long enough.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Not looking so full of yourself,are you now, assassin?
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: You betrayed your own father!TAKMET: Yes.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You could tell by the look on his face.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MEMNON: You have proven your loyalty, Takmet.
title: The Scorpion King

text: CASSANDRA: He shall not die tonight.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Nor shall he die by your hand...
title: The Scorpion King

text: You have seen this in a vision?
title: The Scorpion King

text: To ignore this would bring great misfortune.
title: The Scorpion King

text: The gods show him favor on this night.
title: The Scorpion King

text: How to kill you without using my handor any hand I command.
title: The Scorpion King

text: This smoke, it causes the fire antsto abandon their homes, you see?
title: The Scorpion King

text: All the sooner to feast on our naked heads.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: You think that's funny?ARPID: It's a little bit funny. Yes.
title: The Scorpion King

text: ARPID: You see, I am about to escape, while you onthe other hand are about to die a horrible death...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...for leaving me to die last night!
title: The Scorpion King

text: So, what are you waiting for?
title: The Scorpion King

text: You see that one up there?
title: The Scorpion King

text: He's been drinking that yak piss for aboutan hour now. And sometime very soon. Ah...
title: The Scorpion King

text: RED GUARD #1:Hey, where's the horse thief?
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: All right, come on,get me out of here.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Remember, you are an Akkadian. If you makean oath, you always have to keep it, right?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Promise to take me with you and sharein the spoils of your adventures.
title: The Scorpion King

text: All right, fine. Yes, I promise.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Oh, here's one. Ah. That's a big one!My, here comes the mother!
title: The Scorpion King

text: ARPID: So, where are we going?
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: To Memnon's kingdomto avenge my brother's death.
title: The Scorpion King

text: - Who are you calling?- My ride.
title: The Scorpion King

text: ARPID: Not much room back here.Scoot up, please.
title: The Scorpion King

text: - Aah. Hey!- We had a deal!
title: The Scorpion King

text: That's right.And I haven't killed you... yet.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MEMNON: What news from my sorceress today?
title: The Scorpion King

text: CASSANDRA:Your armies will conquer in the west.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Queen Isis' forces willscatter to the four winds.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Give the generals the news. Have them maketheir armies ready for the final campaign.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MEMNON: You think I am cruel, don't you?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Perhaps you have forgottenwhat it's like outside these walls.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I will bring order after centuries of chaos.
title: The Scorpion King

text: An order which will last for a 1,000 years!
title: The Scorpion King

text: Rivers of blood can never bring peace.But they can bring obedience!
title: The Scorpion King

text: And when I become the king of legend...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...then you shall take your place beside me,on a throne...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...in your bed,I would lose my gift of sight.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And you would lose your advantage in battle.
title: The Scorpion King

text: The day I speak of is the day,I no longer need your vision.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Let me tell you. After a hard day of looting andpillaging, there is no greater city than Gomorrah.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I wish I could join you.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Believe me, I'd like to even the scorewith a few of those red guards myself.
title: The Scorpion King

text: But with the price they have got on my head,I'd never make it through those gates.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I have faith in you, my friend.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You see? They have got the city sealed uptighter than a crab's buttocks.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I wish there was somethingI could do to help, but I... I...
title: The Scorpion King

text: What business do you have here?
title: The Scorpion King

text: I have come to collect a bounty.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I know this dog.They will behead him for sure this time.
title: The Scorpion King

text: He will be all the prettier without it.
title: The Scorpion King

text: - What happened?- You got us in. I knew you could do it.
title: The Scorpion King

text: A jug of your finest winefor my road-weary friend here.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Wait a minute.The last thing that I remember was...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ....this huge Akkadian fist coming straightinto my... Here's your wine, sir.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Please. Let me know ifthere's anything else you'd like.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Ah.It's good to be back in the big city.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MERCHANT: Merchandise of the highest quality.Virgin steel forged by the monks of Pompeii.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Here! Here they are! The world's finest swords.You can't get respect in Gomorrah without....
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...a quality blade. Birds of paradise! Birdsof prey! The most beautiful birds in the world.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Hey, soldier, those big muscles look cramped.
title: The Scorpion King

text: - Perhaps one of us can help you relax.- Maybe all of us.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You need a guide to find your way in Gomorrah.
title: The Scorpion King

text: A good guide might be able to showme a way into Memnon's palace.
title: The Scorpion King

text: But a smart guide wouldn't, or he'd beshown into Memnon's dungeon.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Do you want to earn this one?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Get ready.I will kill half, you kill half.
title: The Scorpion King

text: All right. I will kill them all.
title: The Scorpion King

text: How about we go around themand not kill anybody?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Good Lord!Are you going to kill me?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Memnon's always threatened to have my head.
title: The Scorpion King

text: PHILOS: Don't touch that.TUTU: What is it?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Yeah, magic powder. It's from a Chineseformula that I procured at great expense.
title: The Scorpion King

text: If I get the recipe right,it will move mountains.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Like all my inventions,Memnon will try to use it for war.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Why?You mean to kill him, do you?
title: The Scorpion King

text: In that case,I'd say he was in the training courtyard.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You know the penalty for thievery.
title: The Scorpion King

text: How do I get out of here?
title: The Scorpion King

text: PHILOS:That's one of my latest inventions.
title: The Scorpion King

text: It was meant to be a quick means of transportation,but there was a little problem with the landings.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Don't touch that, you will set it off.
title: The Scorpion King

text: HAREM GIRL #1: Memnon's harem.But he visits so rarely.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Can't you leave me alone, Thorak?
title: The Scorpion King

text: You're lucky Lord Memnonhas a taste for your science...
title: The Scorpion King

text: If I find out that you had anything to dowith this intruder, I will send the executioner.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: Oh, I am sure you do, ladies, but I...GIRL #2: Stay with us.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Stay with us. Stay with us.MATHAYUS: That's nice, but now's not a good time.
title: The Scorpion King

text: We will make your every fantasy come true.
title: The Scorpion King

text: [Gong sounds and harem girls cry out]
title: The Scorpion King

text: CASSANDRA: Well, are you going to tryto kill me or just stare at me?
title: The Scorpion King

text: [Sound of guards trying to break down door]
title: The Scorpion King

text: CASSANDRA: How dare you touch me?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Sorceress, I am an Akkadian,hired to kill you.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Now, I find myself in the positionwhere you are more use to me alive.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Don't make me change my mind.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And he said, "It's not the size ofthe hump, it is the motion of the camel."
title: The Scorpion King

text: Alas, I must leave you now.
title: The Scorpion King

text: ARPID: He's dead!Just admit it, you smelly camel.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I am your master now!You belong to me!
title: The Scorpion King

text: I was just saying to the camel:
title: The Scorpion King

text: "Camel, no one could killour good friend Mathayus."
title: The Scorpion King

text: Why should I make it easy for you?You're sworn to kill me.
title: The Scorpion King

text: She's going to get us all killed!
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: Memnon will have to leavethe safety of his palace to get her.
title: The Scorpion King

text: So you're going to use me first,and then kill me. I feel so much better.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I could always do it the other way aroundand kill you first.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: The Valley of the Dead.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Nobody goes to the Valley of the Dead!That's why they call it the Valley of the Dead!
title: The Scorpion King

text: Take a dozen of your best men,track him down, kill him...
title: The Scorpion King

text: Send me news when he's dead.
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...there are rumors spreadingto the armies that she is gone.
title: The Scorpion King

text: - It is, my lord.- Then silence them.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MEMNON: They must believe she is here,if only for a short time.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And when you find the Akkadian...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ARPID: Are we where I think we are?
title: The Scorpion King

text: In a hurry to get back to Memnon?
title: The Scorpion King

text: No, I am in a hurry to get away from you.I will never go back to Memnon.
title: The Scorpion King

text: He's kept me prisoner since I was a child.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Why did you help me that night in the tent?
title: The Scorpion King

text: I knew you were the one manwho could help me escape.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Run, if you like.But there are worse dangers out there than me.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: What do you meanyou can't find it?
title: The Scorpion King

text: I know it's around here somewhere.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Just a little place to get out of the storm.
title: The Scorpion King

text: He sent his maggots to do his work.
title: The Scorpion King

text: The sun has fried his brain.
title: The Scorpion King

text: A 1,000 duranas to the onewho brings me his head!
title: The Scorpion King

text: ARPID: You are alive! You swatted themlike flies! You are invincible!
title: The Scorpion King

text: Tell me, do you think you can save him?
title: The Scorpion King

text: The poison was made with scorpion venom.If he does live...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...the blood of the scorpionwill always flow through his veins.
title: The Scorpion King

text: She cured you.I knew it! I felt her magic!
title: The Scorpion King

text: It almost killed her.But, the gods, they were on our side.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Why? Why would you risk your lifeto save mine?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Because I believe you can save the people.
title: The Scorpion King

text: The people are not my problem.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You and the people have the same problem.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Pardon, my lord.A message from Thorak.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Is there something wrong, my lord?
title: The Scorpion King

text: In fact, things are going so well...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...that I am moving up our plans.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Tomorrow night, we feastto celebrate our impending victory.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And then we will drive the lastof the rebels into the sea.
title: The Scorpion King

text: It is customary for the sorceressto be present at these meetings.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Why is she not here today?
title: The Scorpion King

text: It is nothing serious, I hope.
title: The Scorpion King

text: She is with him and he is coming here.
title: The Scorpion King

text: My lady, how lovely to see you out herein this desolate place.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Let me show you. It works!
title: The Scorpion King

text: My Chinese formula.My magic powder works!
title: The Scorpion King

text: All I needed was salt, petered salt.
title: The Scorpion King

text: It was here all the time.This place is just full of it.
title: The Scorpion King

text: By the way,do any of you happen to have any water?
title: The Scorpion King

text: CASSANDRA: What do you think,it is safe to drink?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Delicious. You see, the sandstonemust act as a natural filter.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I am alive! I am alive!
title: The Scorpion King

text: The gods are good to me.
title: The Scorpion King

text: When we last met, you offered to kill me.Now I have a chance to return the favor.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Our survival dependson this place being kept a secret.
title: The Scorpion King

text: So we have a problem,as long as you're alive.
title: The Scorpion King

text: ARPID: No problem.I can keep a secret like no other.
title: The Scorpion King

text: In fact, I cannot remember how we got here.We took a left turn...
title: The Scorpion King

text: BALTHAZAR: It's too late for that.ISIS: Balthazar!
title: The Scorpion King

text: This place is sanctuary for all ofMemnon's enemies. You know that.
title: The Scorpion King

text: - This man is dangerous!- Your judgment is clouded.
title: The Scorpion King

text: My judgment keeps all of you alive!
title: The Scorpion King

text: This man cannot be trustedand I will prove it.
title: The Scorpion King

text: The first man to touch herwill have to come through me.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I had hoped for nothing less.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: We're brothers in the same cause.BALTHAZAR: Brothers?
title: The Scorpion King

text: You brought death to my people.Memnon will follow you.
title: The Scorpion King

text: He will come for his sorceress.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Yes, I know who she is.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Memnon will stop at nothingto see her return.
title: The Scorpion King

text: He will come swifter and deadlier oncehe has her. Memnon will stop at nothing.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Hide here as long as you can, but believeme when I say he will find you.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And if he isn't stopped, he will sweepacross this land and kill all of you.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And who's going to stop him, Akkadian?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Will you stand alonebefore the fury of his armies?
title: The Scorpion King

text: A gentleman always lets a lady win.Best two out of three?
title: The Scorpion King

text: CASSANDRA: I have had a vision.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Memnon will follow me hereand destroy these people.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Some are certain and some remain shadows.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Memnon will release his armiesand ride straight through this place.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Memnon will die by my hand.
title: The Scorpion King

text: It seems the gods favor me tonight, Akkadian.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Where do you think you're going with my horse?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Nothing we can say will stop him.
title: The Scorpion King

text: She returned to save the lives of your people.I won't let her face Memnon's wrath alone.
title: The Scorpion King

text: BALTHAZAR:Akkadian, you are riding to your death.
title: The Scorpion King

text: If I let you ride alone...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...what glory will there be left for me?
title: The Scorpion King

text: I would have captured him myself,but he ran like a coward.
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...there is something thatis troubling our soldiers.
title: The Scorpion King

text: It's been saidthe sorceress is no longer by your side.
title: The Scorpion King

text: You have my word, she is perfectly safe.
title: The Scorpion King

text: If the men are to fight, to die...
title: The Scorpion King

text: You doubt my word?It is not that, sire.
title: The Scorpion King

text: It's just that she is a symbolfrom which the men derive courage.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Symbols are most effective when seen.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I am here at your request.
title: The Scorpion King

text: But our impending victory has lifted my spirit.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Is this sufficient to placate your men?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Tell them what you see, sorceress.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Your enemies will reveal themselves to you.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Actually, it is a bit of a surprise.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Let's see that pretty little face.
title: The Scorpion King

text: GENERAL: My sincerest apologies, my lord.
title: The Scorpion King

text: To bed, men, for tomorrow we conquer!
title: The Scorpion King

text: MATHAYUS: All right, that was the easy part.
title: The Scorpion King

text: - Everybody know what to do?- Cripple the guards.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And try not to get killed.
title: The Scorpion King

text: What are you doing here?You could get hurt.
title: The Scorpion King

text: So could you.Stay in the wagon.
title: The Scorpion King

text: No need for concern, miss.Oh, he's going to pay for that.
title: The Scorpion King

text: TAKMET: Seal the gates. Seal all the gates.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Though I am relieved to see you unharmed...
title: The Scorpion King

text: ...I am somewhat surprisedthe Akkadian didn't kill you.
title: The Scorpion King

text: He was after you.I was merely a pawn.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I am not without my wiles.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Yes, I am well aware of that.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MEMNON: That is your vision?CASSANDRA: As I said, I have seen it.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I sense a change in you.
title: The Scorpion King

text: A small demonstrationshouldn't trouble you, then.
title: The Scorpion King

text: ARPID: Where am I going?PHILOS: Stop.
title: The Scorpion King

text: It's over there.It should be just there.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Now...let's see what you can see.
title: The Scorpion King

text: MEMNON: You know what I see?
title: The Scorpion King

text: MEMNON: What magic is this?CASSANDRA: Mine.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I see your fate, hollow king.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Do you wish to test magic against steel?
title: The Scorpion King

text: I have come for the woman and your head.
title: The Scorpion King

text: PHILOS:Hurry, we're running out of time.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I am hurrying! I am hurrying!
title: The Scorpion King

text: And Palace guard at your back.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Looks like I will be keeping my headafter all, Akkadian.
title: The Scorpion King

text: It seems the gods favor me tonight, Akkadian.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Hurry up and light it. You hurry upand light it. This is your invention.
title: The Scorpion King

text: ARMY LEADER: Attack![Soldiers let out battle cry]
title: The Scorpion King

text: So much for not getting killed.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I knew it from the start.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Stay here with us, Balthazar.There's much work to be done.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I have to look after my own people.
title: The Scorpion King

text: And a good one, I think.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Don't forget how you got here,or the people you came from.
title: The Scorpion King

text: My people will live on through me.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Remember, there will always bea place for you here.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Remember, Nubian eyes will be watching you,Scorpion King.
title: The Scorpion King

text: I see a time of greatpeace and prosperity ahead.
title: The Scorpion King

text: How is it you see this?
title: The Scorpion King

text: Don't the legends sayyou will lose your powers if you...
title: The Scorpion King

text: Can you think of a better way to keepa king from taking advantage?
title: The Scorpion King

text: And how long will this time of peace last?
title: The Scorpion King

text: And that is the destiny of all kingdoms.
title: The Scorpion King

text: Then we will make our own destiny.
title: The Scorpion King
